full_summary:
=====

# Tactical Compute Cancellation Announcement
==============================================

## Reference Information

* Reference Number: WS4252031390-Doc4252031463
* Solicitation Number: WS4252031390
* Publication Date: October 11, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: 14:00 EDST October 17, 2023

## Description
------------

Due to unforeseen circumstances, the Department of National Defence (DND) has revised the Request for Proposal (RFP) to cancel the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) component of the procurement process. This RFP, [W6399-24EC04](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-GC-20254678), was initially intended for Supply Arrangement # W6399-22CA50 holders only.

## Clarifications
---------------

* The RFP posting on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys has been updated to reflect the cancellation of the ITQ component.
* The RFP will no longer be extended to provide additional time for bidders to qualify for the Supply Arrangement and submit a proposal.
* Only existing holders of Supply Arrangement # W6399-22CA50 are eligible to participate in the procurement process.
* To qualify, bidders must be registered under the same Supply Arrangement and have a current ‘Active’ status.

## Contact Information
-------------------------

For any inquiries or concerns regarding this notice, please refer to the contact information below:

* Name: Shamael Malko-Moore (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Procurement Details
----------------------

* Procurement Category: Government of Canada
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Supply Arrangement Holder Only
* Purchase of Tactical Compute Modules
* Submission Deadline: 14:00 EDST October 17, 2023

Note that this text only includes essential information and rephrases the original text in a more professional tone. I have also added headings and links to make the content easier to navigate. Please let me know if you need further modifications!
